item.title: Open-Sourcing Tutor-GPT
item.description: ![[assets/human_machine_learning.jpeg]] TL;DR Today we’re open-sourcing Bloom, our digital Aristotelian learning companion. What makes Bloom compelling is its ability to reason pedagogically about the learner.

item.title: Theory-of-Mind Is All You Need
item.description: TL;DR Today we’re releasing a major upgrade to Bloom (& the open-source codebase, Tutor-GPT). We gave our tutor even more autonomy to reason about the psychology of the user, and—using GPT-4 to dynamically rewrite its own system prompts—we’re able to dramatically expand the scope of what Bloom can do and massively reduce our prompting architecture.
